title: Win a Chumba Cycles Slackr with Bikepacking Roots
content:
Chumba USA, Astral Cycling, and Bike Flights have teamed up with a group of like-minded friends to give away an all-new, one-of-a-kind, USA-built adventure machine. All proceeds go directly to support Bikepacking Roots’ (BPR) BIPOC Bike Adventure Grant.

 

The newly released Chumba Slackr mountain bike frame will feature Astral Serpentine Wheels, Cane Creek Helm fork, and components from other Bikepacking Roots Sponsors White Industries, Shimano, Dispersed Bikepacking and Paul Components. The full bike – built to the size specification of the winner – will ship to the new owner courtesy of Bike Flights in their new BBL Box.

Two runner-up prizes further spread the stoke. Second and third place winners will be the lucky new owners of a full Old Man Mountain Rack and Bags set-up or new bikepacking apparel from Ornot Bike.

 

The BIPOC Bike Adventure Grant is BPR’s coordinated effort to reduce barriers to bike adventure for BIPOC people. The program provides grants to BIPOC Community Leaders to host trips, develop gear libraries, and other community building activities. Support for this program is needed now more than ever.

By donating now, you can help support inclusion in the bikepacking and cycling community AND earn a chance to win this amazing bike, racks and bags, or new apparel! The complete custom bike build has an approximate retail value of $8,000 and includes the following:

  • Chumba USA Slackr Steel Frame
  • Astral Serpentine 29 Wheels
  • Cane Creek Helm Fork
  • Shimano XT kit
  • White Industries hubs, headset and crankset
  • Paul Components bits to round it out
  • A custom frame bag from Dispersed Bikepacking

With further help from Bike Flights, the bike will be making the rounds throughout March. It will be displayed at Philly Bike Expo (3/8 – 3/9), the Mid-South Gravel Expo (3/14) and the East Texas Showdown(3/27 – 3/30). Come check it out, meet the Bikepacking Roots Family and drop in an entry at these awesome events – but you do not need to be present to win. By hitting this link, you can make a donation of your selected level and enter the drawing now.

The more you donate, the more chances you will have to win! Make a difference, have some fun, and enjoy the ride!
